name: Tea-Fallin'
description:
Watch out! There are drops of tea falling from the sky! Better use your teacup to catch as many as you can.  But watch out! There are spiders falling from the sky as well, and if too many of them land in your cup, the tea will become undrinkable! Let's see how much tea you can collect!

This game was made in under 3 hours for Trijam #136.
